     │ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Unexpected end of input. Expecting FunctionName Got: () = 1
     │ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Unexpected end of input. Missing FunctionParamsList

     │             ^^^^^^ Unexpected end of input. Expecting FunctionName Got: () = 1
     │                    Unexpected end of input. Missing FunctionParamsList
     │                    Unexpected end of input. Missing FunAssignExpression
